metadata.title: CVE-2022-3287 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - low
metadata.description: When creating an OPERATOR user account on the BMC, the redfish plugin savedthe auto-generated password to /etc/fwupd/redfish.conf without properrestriction, allowing any user on the system to read the same configurationfile.

criterions.comment: fwupd package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
